desciption: As the name suggest "Bharat Supply & Support of Advance Technologies" the entity focuses on indigenous development of Advance "Next-Generation" and "Cutting-Edge" Technologies, Supporting critical infrastructure with an integrated supply-chain of electronics and electro optics components and critical semi-conductors for manufacturing and repair & maintenance units. Also, it provides design solutions for modernisation and upgradation of electronic assemblies and sub-assemblies and technology development, integration, automation, and testing services.

options.text: Development of CNT (Carbon Nanotubes) - Polymer fibres for high strength applications in Space, Aerospace, Automobile etc
Satellite Based Air Navigation & Landing system for deployments in India SAARC.
Laser, LiDAR, Additives, Electro optics etc. with indigenous capacity building of critical technologies and their varied applications.
Device for determining state of alcohol intoxication.
Development of Amphibious boats, capable of manoeuvring in shallow waters, costal land area (without any requirement of dock).
Technology for autonomously producing pure hydrogen by hydrothermal oxidation of aluminium.
